A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing doesn’t begin to describe this movie. I’m not a Star Wars fan to the point of directing every little piece of them all looking for errors. A child of the 1970’s\, I love Star Wars and movies in general so I’m pretty easy to entertain. I didn’t overhype the movie or give it unachievable expectations. It was just a disappointing movie. Boring\, 60 min too long with too many moments where most people are shaking their head in the theatre asking “WTF?” Movie critics today are like election pollsters\, so out of touch with the people that they would give this a 92% score! Wait for video for this one.
